price: (33) And who is better in speech than one who invites to Allāh and does righteousness and says, "Indeed, I am of the Muslims."
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ قَوۡلٗا مِّمَّن دَعَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا وَقَالَ إِنَّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waman aḥsanu qawlan mimman daʿā ilā al-lahi waʿamila ṣāliḥan waqāla innanī mina al-mus'limīna
